entry.title: Embedding Introduction (VI)
entry.content:
SDNE : Structural Deep Network Embedding

DeepWalk, LINE, Node2vec Graph Embedding Embedding skip-gram SDNE

SDNE

Autoencoder

Autoencoder for second-order proximity

autoencoder

$x_i \in R^{|V|}$ $|V|$ $(i, j)$ $x_{ij} > 0$ $x_{ij} = w_{ij}$ edge $(i,j)$ $x_{ij} = 0$

encoder $x_i$

$i$ embedding $y_i^{(K)}$

decoder revert $\hat{x_i}$

autoencoder $x_i$ $\hat{x_i}$ loss

loss

$$
\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{L}_{2nd} &= \sum^n_i |(\mathbf{\hat{x}}_i - \mathbf{x}_i) \bigodot \mathbf{b}_i|^2_2 \\
&= |(\hat{X}_i - X_i) \bigodot B |^2_F
\end{aligned}
$$

$\bigodot$ Hadamard $s_{i,j} = 0$ $b_{i,j} = 1$ $b_{i,j} = \beta > 1$ $S$ autoencoder embedding

Supervised component for first-order proximity

global first-order proximity

$$
\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{L}_{1st} &= \sum^n_{i,j = 1} s_{i,j}|y^{K}_i - y^{K}_j|^2_2\\
&= \sum^n_{i,j = 1} s_{i,j}|y_i - y_j|^2_2
\end{aligned}
$$

( markdown mathjax _ _ )

$y$

proximity

$$
\mathcal{L}_{reg} = \frac{1}{2}\sum^K_{k = 1}(|W^{(k)} |^2_F + |\hat{W}^{(k)} |^2_F)
$$

$W^{(k)}$ $\hat{W}^{(k)}$ encoder decoder

$$
\begin{aligned}
\mathcal{L}_{mix} &= \mathcal{L}_{2nd} + \alpha\mathcal{L}_{1st} + \mu\mathcal{L}_{reg} \\
&= |(\hat{X}_i - X_i) \bigodot B |^2_F + \alpha \sum^n_{i,j = 1} s_{i,j}|y_i - y_j|^2_2 + \mu\mathcal{L}_{reg}
\end{aligned}
$$

LINE

Reference

Structural Deep Network Embedding

entry.title: Embedding Introduction (V)
entry.content:
DeepWalk - Node2Vec

deepwalk DFS graph embedding LINE BFS graph embedding node2vec DFS BFS graph embedding DFS BFS deep walk

  1. $f(u)$ $u$ embedding

  2. $N_S(u)$ $S$ $u$

node2vec $f(u)$

$$
max_f\sum_{u \in V} \log Pr(N_s(u) | f(u))
$$

  1. $u$

    $$
    Pr(N_s(u) | f(u)) = \prod_{n_i\in N_s(u)} Pr(n_i | f(u))
    $$

  2. LINE embedding

    $$
    Pr(n_i | f(u)) = \frac{\exp(f(n_i)\cdot f(u))}{\sum_{v\in V} \exp(f(v)\cdot f(u))}
    $$

$$
max_f\sum_{v\in V}\left[-\log Z_u + \sum_{n_i\in N_s(u)} f(n_i) \cdot f(u)\right]
$$

$Z_u = \sum_{n\in N_s(u)} \exp(f(n_i)\cdot f(u))$

deep walk node2vec

$v$ $x$

$$
P(c_i = x | c_{ - 1} = v) = \frac{\pi_{vx}}{Z} \text{, if } (v, x) \in E
$$

$$
P(c_i = x | c_{i - 1} = v) = 0 \text{, otherwise}
$$

$\pi_{vx}$ $v$ $x$ normalized $Z$

node2vec $p$ $q$

$$
\pi_{vx} = \alpha_{pq}(t, x)\cdot w_{vx}
$$

$w_{vx}$ $v$ $x$ $\alpha_{pq}$ $t$ $x$ $d_{tx}$

  • $d_{tx} = 0$ $\alpha_{pq}(t, x) = \frac{1}{p}$ $p$ return parameter node
  • $d_{tx} = 1$ $t, x$ $v$ $\alpha_{pq}(t, x) = 1$
  • $d_{tx} = 2$ $x$ $t$ $\alpha_{pq}(t, x) = \frac{1}{q}$ $q$ in-out parameter

$p, q$ BFS DFS random walk :

entry.title: Embedding-Introduction (IV)
entry.content:
LINE

LINE proximity

first-order proximity

$$
O_1 = - \sum_{(i, j)\in E} w_{ij}\log p_1(v_i, v_j) \tag{1}
$$

second-order proximity

$$
O_2 = - \sum_{(i, j)\in E} w_{ij} \log p_2(v_j|v_i) \tag{2}
$$

second-order proximity $(i, j)$

$$
\log\sigma(\vec{u_j}^{1T} \cdot \vec{u_i}) + \sum^K_{i = 1} E_{v_n \sim P_n(v)}\left[\log\sigma(\vec{u}_n^{1T} \cdot \vec{u}_i)\right] \tag{3}
$$

$\sigma(x) = 1 / (1 + \exp(-x))$ sigmod $K$ $P_n(v) \propto d_v^{3/4}$ $d_v$ $v$

$1$ $\forall i k, u_{ik} = \infty$ $3$ $\vec{u_j}^{1T}$ $\vec{u_j}^{T}$

$3$asynchronous stochastic gradient algorithm, ASGDASGD mini-batch $(i, j)$ ( $i$ embedding $\vec{u_i}$)

$$
\frac{\partial O_2}{\partial \vec{u_i}} = w_{ij}\cdot \frac{\partial \log p_2(v_j|v_i)}{\partial \vec{u_i}}
$$

$w$ unfold $w$ 0 - 1 $w$ 0 - 1 XGBoost

$W = (w_1, w_2, , w_{|E|})$ $w_{sum} = \sum_{i = 1}^{|E|}$ sample $O(|E|)$ alias table $O(1)$

$O(1)$ $O(d(K + 1))$ $K$ $O(dK)$ $|E|$LINE $O(dK|E|)$

Embedding (II)

Word2Vec embedding state-of-art NLP / skip-gram using negative sampling i2i (CF) SVN CF Item2Vec

Reference: Efficient estimation of word representations in vector space

SGNS

$(w_i)^K_{i = 1}$ $W = {w_i}^W_{i=1}$ skip - gram

$$
rac{1}{K} \sum^K_{i = 1} \sum_{-c <= j <= c, j eq 0} \log{p(w_{i + j} | w_i)} ag{1}
$$

$c$ $w_i$ $p(w_{i + j} | w_i)$ softmax

$$
p(w_{i + j} | w_i) = rac{\exp(u^T_iv_j)}{\sum_{k\in I_w}\exp(u^T_iv^T_k)}
$$

$u_i\in U(\mathcal{R^m}) $ $v_i \in V(\mathcal{R^m})$ $w_i \in W$ $m$ softmax $ abla p(w_{i + j} | w_i)$

softmax

$$
p(w_{i + j} | w_i) = \sigma(u^T_iv_j)\prod^N_{k=1} \sigma(u^T_iv^T_k)
$$

$\sigma(x) = rac{1}{1 + \exp(-x)}$$N$ $w_i$ Unigram Distribution $f(w_i)$ $ rac{3}{4}$

$$
P(w_i) = rac{f(w_i)^{3/4}}{\sum_{j = 0}^n(f(w_i)^{3/4})}
$$

$$

entry.title: Self Introduction
entry.content:
Self Introduction

My name is Jason Zeng, a junior machine learning engineer worked in Kuaishou Corporation last year. For the first half of the year, I was working as an intern in search scene of HashTag. My major target is to improve the ranking result by comparing query-photo relevance. While in the second half of the year, I became a full time employer in search scene of Electric Commerce. My major work is focus on the recall and coarse-grained ranking stage.

Prior to working, I gained my bachelor degree in University of Chinese Academy of Science in Beijing, and then I pursue my Ph.D. study in University of California, San Diego. In 2020, I quit my Ph.D. programme and went back to China with master degree.

Thats all for my introduction, thank you.

entry.title: Hexo
entry.content:
Mac Node.js

  • Homebrew Node.js npm

Hexo

  • npm Hexo

Hexo

  1. directory: mkdir ~/hexo/dir && cd ~/hexo/dir

  2. hexo init

  3. : hexo g \ hexo generate

  4. hexo s\ hexo server http://localhost:4000/

  5. config ~/hexo/dir/_config.yml

  6. hexo d \ hexo deploy (-m message)

  1. hexo n "your title"\ hexo new "your title"

  2. md () cd ~/hexo/dir/source/_posts/your title.md

  3. : hexo g \ hexo generate

  4. hexo s\ hexo server http://localhost:4000/

  5. hexo d \ hexo deploy (-m message)
